item.title: Exclusive: Trump says Hamas helped find last hostage, now must disarm - Axios
item.description: Exclusive: Trump says Hamas helped find last hostage, now must disarm AxiosIsrael recovers body of last hostage in Gaza CNNRemains of last Israeli hostage found in Gaza, paving way for next phase of ceasefire NBC NewsIsrael Recovers Body of Ran Gvili From Gaza, Closing a Chapter The New York TimesNews Wrap: Israel recovers remains of final Gaza hostage PBS

item.title: Israel says it has retrieved remains of final Gaza hostage
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu called Ran Gvili’s return “an extraordinary achievement”.

item.title: Israel confirms recovery of last hostage's remains from Gaza
item.description: The remains of Ran Gvili, the final Israeli hostage held by Hamas, have been recovered from Gaza. The police officer died defending Israel on Oct. 7.
